name: Covid Fury
description:
COVID FURY Game made in 10 days for the Bullet Hell game jam 2022. Theme was CONFINED CONTROLS

Use WASD or ARROW KEYS or LEFT JOYSTICK of a controller to MOVE!

Use SPACE or the A (xbox)  X (ps4) to DASH!

Use SHIFT or B (xbox) O (ps4) to SLOW DOWN TIME!

ASSETS

Art and Code: PadjokeJ

Music by: FOREVERSPENCER  - SoundCloud - Spotify
